entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
